attributes.action: Reduced tax for all key workers 2021
attributes.additional_details: The government has set up packages for businesses and the public. However our key workers will be going to work and risking themselves for our government and our country. I understand this is pressing times for the UK government however, we should be on top of this virus by next year and therefore be able to thank our ket workers by reducing the tax they pay.
attributes.background: Tax discount in 2021 for all NHS staff and key workers that are risking contracting COVID-19.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
